text: Andrea Anastasi (born October 8, 1960 in Poggio Rusco, Italy) is a former Italian volleyball player, World Champion 1990, European Championship 1989, World League 1990 and World League 1991, head coach of Polish club Lotos Trefl Gda≈Ñsk. ==Other websites== * Lega Pallavolo Serie A player profile Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Italian volleyball players Category:Volleyball coaches
